question: 2013 niá kàu 2014 niá, 'consumer lending ( a )' ê 'net charge-offs to average loans' kiám-chió liáu kúi-á pah-hun-tet?
2013 "provision for credit losses" kah "other" ê siông-suán kè-hòe, kiōng-kiông sī kúi kó͘-la̍h bān?

Tī 'choân-tâi hō͘ chè-choán chham jīm-bū hō͘ ê hòan-chiá kàu choân-tâi chè-choán pêr-pia̍h-lī' thè pí-kàu koân ê nî-tāi, 'siong-bū chè-choán hō͘ chè-choán sûn-chū chòe-hō͘ ê kè-chiá' sī siáⁿ-mih kè-ta̍t?
Koa-chú "chôan-tē chiap-la̍t sńg-tiāu" ê nî-chham-nî kài-liâu chóaⁿ-iūⁿ? Kóaⁿ-nāi chit ê kài-liâu chóaⁿ-iūⁿ sī-khóaⁿ chòe chhoan-o̍h-tāi-chú ê tín-chhiam-sèng?
answer: "Chôan-tē chiap-la̍t sńg-tiāu" tùi 2013 nî ê $1077 pah-bān kiám-chió kàu 2014 nî ê $531 pah-bān, kiám-chió liáu chē-chāi chhāi 50%. Chit ê kiám-chió ê kài-liâu chin thian-tiāu-chāi sī chhoan-o̍h-tāi-chú ê chât-liōng kah khah ū-hāu ê tín-chhiam-sèng koán-lí tī hit ê sî-kan tōa.

question: 2013 nî, chiah-sī chiong-sòo chhiau-kòe 500 pah bān bí-goân ê chha-sit-tiâu lūi-hāng ū siáⁿ-chē?
2014 nî ê 'total net charge-offs' tiong, 'consumer lending' chiàm kúi siok percent?
Nāi-bāi kāng 2014-ê ‘provision for credit losses’ nā-sī tiâⁿ-ke 20% koh-khah koân, sin ê ‘december 31’ ê piâⁿ-hêng-chèu ē-sī siáⁿ-mih, kā pa̍t-ê hāng-bo̍k lóng bōe tiāⁿ-sīⁿ ê chêng-hêng hā?
Tùi chit ê piáu, "siūⁿ-chòe bōe-tiāⁿ-ê kîⁿ-chòe (total net charge-offs)" hām "chè-chōan siūⁿ-chòe ê siu-chek (provision for credit losses)" tī 2013 hām 2014 nî chi kan ū sím-me ê koan-hē?
answer: Ū chi̍t ê kiông-tō͘ chin-chē ê tùi-tâng koan-hē. Tī 2013 nî, bōe-tiāⁿ-ê kîⁿ-chòe chin koân ($1077M) hām chè-chōan chin koân ($643M) tūi-èng. Tī 2014 nî, tio̍h-sī bōe-tiāⁿ-ê kîⁿ-chòe kiám kah chin chē (kàu $531M), chè-chōan siūⁿ-chòe ê siu-chek mā kiám kah chē (kàu $273M). Chit-ê piáu-sī chè-chōan sī chiàu si̍t-chè ê chè-chōan sí-sòng ê tōa-sió lâi tiâu-chéng.

question: Tshiu chhut phio u lim ê kim-liat chhap-chit, siá-tē teh 2014 kah 2013 nn̄g nî lóng bô kè-siâu ê?
answer: net charge-offs to average loans ( for the year ended )

question: Tī 2013 chì 2014 kî-kan, nńg-ê chè-tāi chong-lūi, tùi-sū-chè-tāi hām tiêu-hùi-chè-tāi, nńg-ê 'tī tiong-ng hō͘-sǹg chè-tāi ê chhiam-sún sī-lē' pí-hō, sī nńg-ê ū khah tōa ê siong-tùi cheng-chìn?
answer: Tùi-sū-chè-tāi ū khah tōa ê siong-tùi cheng-chìn. I ê pí-hō tùi 0.22% thè kah 0.04%, tùi 2013 nî ê tōa-chha̍t kiảm-chió 81.8%. Tò-liân, tiêu-hùi-chè-tāi ê pí-hō tùi 1.07 thè kah 0.62, chi̍t ê khah sió ê siong-tùi kiảm-chió 42.1%. Tùi-sū-chè-tāi pí-hō ê cheng-chhia-lē kiảm-chió hō͘ i teh cheng-cheng thiam-sún chi̍t ê chha̍t-tiāu.

question: 2013 nî kàu 2014 nî, chóng-sò͘ ê net charge-offs (bâi bān-gô͘-jîn) kiám-chió liōng sī chōa-chē?
